original: @#/_/dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod🔽pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: @#/_/dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/
translated: Praise to the Glorious Black Goddess🔽In Sanskrit: Śrī-devī-kālikastotra

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shri de wi ka li stod tra na ma/_bod skad du/
analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shri de wi ka li stod tra na ma/_bod skad du/
translated: In Tibetan: dPal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba

original: dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/_srid gsum zil non 'dod khams
analyzed: dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/_srid gsum zil non 'dod khams
translated: Homage to the powerful one who dominates the three worlds and the desire realm,

original: dbang phyug ma/_/'jig rten gtsho la rtag tu gus phyag 'tshhal/_/ma rnams nang
analyzed: dbang phyug ma/_/'jig rten gtsho la rtag tu gus phyag 'tshhal/_/ma rnams nang
translated: To whom the world always pays homage.🔽Among all mothers, you are supreme,

original: na khyod nyid mchog yin te/_/'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod/_/🔽bzhin mdzes yid 'ong lta bas mi ngoms pa'i/_/yon tan sna tshhogs kun gyis
analyzed: na khyod nyid mchog yin te/_/'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod/_/ bzhin mdzes yid 'ong lta bas mi ngoms pa'i/_/yon tan sna tshhogs kun gyis
translated: And the entire triple world praises you.🔽Your beautiful face is captivating, and your eyes are never satiating.🔽Your body is adorned with various qualities,

original: lus rab brgyan/_spyan mdzes ut+pal sngon po'i mdab ma mdzes/_/bsod
analyzed: lus rab brgyan/_spyan mdzes ut+pal sngon po'i mdab ma mdzes/_/bsod
translated: Your beautiful eyes are as beautiful as blue lotuses,🔽And you are adorned with the net of the light of merit and wisdom.

original: nams ye shes snang ba'i dra bas brgyan/_/nor bu rin chen rin thang med pa
analyzed: nams ye shes snang ba'i dra bas brgyan/_/nor bu rin chen rin thang med pa

original: bzhin/_/ding bdag pad mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang /_/sems la gsal
analyzed: bzhin/_/ding bdag pad mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang /_/sems la gsal
translated: By praising you, the lotus-born one,🔽All wishes will be fulfilled in the mind.

original: ba thams cad grub par 'gyur/_/lha mo dgos 'dod 'grub la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/
analyzed: ba thams cad grub par 'gyur/_/lha mo dgos 'dod 'grub la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/
translated: Homage to the goddess who fulfills all needs and desires.

original: yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis 'dud/_/pad ma lta bu shin tu rnam par dag_/
analyzed: yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis 'dud/_/pad ma lta bu shin tu rnam par dag_/
translated: like a lotus, utterly pure,🔽with a beautiful body color, pleasing to all who see it,

original: lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis lta bas mos/_/yon tan rgya mtshho gter la phyag
analyzed: lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis lta bas mos/_/yon tan rgya mtshho gter la phyag
translated: an ocean of good qualities, a treasure—I pay homage!🔽The beautiful light rays of stainless wisdom

original: 'tshhal lo/_/dri med ye shes 'od zer rab mdzes pa/_/dran pa rnams kyi nang
analyzed: 'tshhal lo/_/dri med ye shes 'od zer rab mdzes pa/_/dran pa rnams kyi nang

original: du mchog tu 'gyur/_/mthu stobs rdzu 'phrul yon tan rtshal mnga' bas/_/
analyzed: du mchog tu 'gyur/_/mthu stobs rdzu 'phrul yon tan rtshal mnga' bas/_/
translated: possessing the qualities of power, strength, and miracles,

original: bdud rigs glang po'i klad chen 'gems la 'dud/_/'di ltar gcan gzan
analyzed: bdud rigs glang po'i klad chen 'gems la 'dud/_/'di ltar gcan gzan
translated: I bow to the one who crushes the elephant-like heads of the māras.🔽Like the supreme beast, the lion,

original: mchog gyur seng ge ltar/_/bstan pa dri med yul 'khor skyong la 'dud/_/de
analyzed: mchog gyur seng ge ltar/_/bstan pa dri med yul 'khor skyong la 'dud/_/de
translated: I bow to the protector of the stainless teachings and the land.

original: ltar sngags shing bstod pa'i dge ba 'dis/_/kun mkhyen mchog la kun nas
analyzed: ltar sngags shing bstod pa'i dge ba 'dis/_/kun mkhyen mchog la kun nas
translated: By this virtue of praising with these verses,🔽may I always abide in the supreme, all-knowing one.

original: gnas par shog_/ces drang srong ke'u tri las bstod pa/_la li ta badzra dang / gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: gnas par shog_/ces drang srong ke'u tri las bstod pa/_la li ta badzra dang / gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: This praise to the sage Kūṭadanta was translated by Lalitavajra and G.yiling Dubu.
